Interface com.chimu.form.database.BasicColumn

public interface BasicColumn
extends Column
A BasicColumn is a column that actually exists on the database. BasicColumn has no added functionality over a Column because Column is the "Component" in a Composite design pattern, and as such defines all the protocol expected of the subtypes.

See Also:
Column, CompoundColumn
